name: GDFOMM
description:
GDFOMM is a game where the player has to find a way out of the maze. It uses a First Person camera and controls are pretty use to learn. The game includes one single level and it was made with Unity in 2015 as a practice project between my friend Kalil (3D art and level design) and me (UI and Programming).

Were you able to get out of the maze? Let me know! :) 
We've been thinking about making another maze game with lots of other features since then, and we'd really appreciate some feedback from people who like the idea.

Controls:
WASD to move
L.Shift to run
Space to jump (not necessary, but it's fun)
